trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the recipient of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"></xref> is the XML Web service, the XML Web service client, or both.
trans-unit.target: Specifica se il destinatario del <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"> </xref> è il servizio Web XML, il client del servizio Web XML o entrambi.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute> can be applied to either an XML Web service method or a method of a proxy class to an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>può essere applicato a un metodo di una classe proxy per un servizio Web XML o di un metodo di servizio Web XML.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>

trans-unit.source: In either case, the recipient(s) are specified by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.Direction%2A> property of <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: In entrambi i casi, i destinatari vengono specificati dalla <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.Direction%2A>proprietà <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.Direction%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify that an XML Web service method returns a SOAP header when an exception is thrown during its execution, apply an <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute> to the method and set the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.Direction%2A> property to Fault.
trans-unit.target: Per specificare che un metodo di servizio Web XML restituisce un'intestazione SOAP quando viene generata un'eccezione durante l'esecuzione, applicare un <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>al metodo e impostare il <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.Direction%2A>proprietà l'errore.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.Direction%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Version 1.0 of the .NET Framework does not support the Fault value.
trans-unit.target: La versione 1.0 di .NET Framework non supporta il valore di errore.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"></xref> is sent to the XML Web service client when an exception is thrown by the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: Specifica il <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"> </xref> viene inviato al client di servizi Web XML quando viene generata un'eccezione dal metodo di servizio Web XML.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"></xref> is sent to the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: Specifica il <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"> </xref> viene inviato al servizio Web XML.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"></xref> is sent to both the XML Web service and the XML Web service client.
trans-unit.target: Specifica il <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"> </xref> viene inviato al servizio Web XML e il client del servizio Web XML.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"></xref> is sent to the XML Web service client.
trans-unit.target: Specifica il <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader"> </xref> viene inviato al client di servizi Web XML.
